casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin Renard CARTER 193PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2017 Richard J. Costanza, Southern Pines, for Carter, Calvin Renard. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 25th of April 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of April 2017."

*393Defendant shall have up to and including the 26th day of May 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
